content: Hello! One of our callers is getting a "connection lost code notification" from a couple of web browsers in Windows, using the Scale To Win dialer. Any suggestions?
It seems like the third browser, MS Edge, worked, so I'm good!
Sorry I didn't reply sooner David!  Sometimes with Scale to Win a brower switch resolves most issues.  We like to recommend Firefox if Chrome is buggy.
No worries! We went from Chrome, to Firefox, to Edge, and somehow Edge worked.
